definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: pasture (cf. Aram. [[דַּבְרָא]], Syr. dabro0)—sf. [[כְּעֵדֶר בְּתוֹח הַדָּֽבְרוֹ]] as a flock in the midst of its pasture Mic 2:12 (art. with sf., cf. Ges:§ 127, 4 b, who attaches [[ו]] as conj. to foll. word); [[וְרָעזּ כְבָשִׂים כְּדֳבְרָם]] and lambs shall feed as (in) their pasture Is 5:17.
